Unparalleld varieties: or, The matchless actions and passions of mankind. Displayed in near four hundred notable instances and examples. Discovering the transcendent effects; I. Of love, friendship, and gratitude. II. Of magnanimity, courage, and fidelity. III. Of chastity, temperance, and humility. And on the contrary the tremendous consequences, IV. Of hatred, revenge, and ingratitude. V. Of cowardice, barbarity, treachery. VI. Of unchastity, intemperance, and ambition. : Imbellished with proper figures. / By R.B. ... R. B., 1632?-1725?
[4], 231, [5] p., [6] leaves of plates : ill.
Printed for Nath. Crouch, at his shop at the sign of the Bell in the Poultry., London, : 1683.
Includes printer's catalog on [5] p. at end. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
